title: #53 Christmas in July with Dorinda Medley (#RHONY)
itunes:title: #53 Christmas in July with Dorinda Medley (#RHONY)
itunes:subtitle: In a very special episode of Everything Iconic, Danny chats with Dorinda Medley and celebrates some of her greatest moments on #RHONY.*Sponsored by Samson Technologies*For bonus episodes, go to Patreon.com/EverythingIconicInstagram: Instagram.com/...
description:
In a very special episode of Everything Iconic, Danny chats with Dorinda Medley and celebrates some of her greatest moments on #RHONY.


*Sponsored by Samson Technologies*

For bonus episodes, go to Patreon.com/EverythingIconic

Instagram: Instagram.com/DannyPellegrino

Twitter: Twitter.com/DannyPellegrino

Facebook: Facebook.com/PellegrinoDanny

Web: EverythingIconic.com

Listen: Acast.com/EverythingIconic

*Produced by Danny & Whitney Fromholtz*


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
